statements: SELECT * FROM Sustainability_Products ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE category = 'Organic';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE price >= 20.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM Sustainability_Products GROUP BY category ORDER BY num_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE price > 50 AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Sustainability_Products GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Sustainability_Products WHERE category LIKE '%Clothing%' OR category LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id='9876-5432-1234' AND contact_person='John Doe';
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Product ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Product WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Product ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, o.order_quantity FROM Product p JOIN Supplier s ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN Order o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id WHERE o.order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY p.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product p INNER JOIN Order o ON p.product_id = o.product_id INNER JOIN Supplier s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.in_stock = TRUE AND s.supplier_location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sustainable_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_available < 20;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM sustainable_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity_available FROM sustainable_products JOIN inventory ON sustainable_products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity_available < 10;
SELECT name, price FROM Products;
SELECT category, price, quantity FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, email, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Orders.id, Products.name, Suppliers.name AS supplier FROM Orders INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.id INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.name AS supplier_name FROM Products p INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON p.id = s.id WHERE p.quantity > 0 ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, o.order_date FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id WHERE o.quantity > 10 ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;
SELECT s.location, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Suppliers s INNER JOIN Inventory i ON s.id = i.product_id GROUP BY s.location HAVING total_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
